TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataListDesigner Inherits TemplatedControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider, IDataSourceProvider
type BaseDataListDesigner = class inherit TemplatedControlDesigner interface IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: 为组件提供一个基类，该组件在设计器宿主中为 类派生的 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主中, 当用户从 " 源" 切换到设计视图时, 将分析描述从抽象类派生的控件的标记源代码, 并在设计图面上创建该控件的设计时版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时, 设计时控件将保存到标记源代码, 并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 抽象类用作为从设计器宿主中的派生的控件提供设计时支持的组件的基类。 The abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 类属性提供了以下功能:The class properties provide the following functionality: 属性返回一个对象, 该对象通常包含一个对象, 该对象是从设计器的继承树中的每个级别派生的。 The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 、、和属性提供对关联控件的相应属性的访问。 The , , , and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control. - 属性提供对关联控件的数据源的设计器的访问。The property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control. 属性获取数据源的默认视图。The property gets the default view of the data source. 类方法提供了以下功能:The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法准备设计器, 以查看、编辑和设计关联的控件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法调用控件的组件编辑器。The method invokes a component editor for the control. 方法用于添加、移除或隐藏关联控件的设计时属性。The method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control. - 方法生成一个对象, 该对象在设计时可用作数据源。The method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time. 方法从关联控件的容器中获取数据源。The method gets the data source from the container of the associated control. 方法从控件容器获取数据源, 并将其解析为特定的数据成员。The method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member. 方法获取模板容器的数据源。The method gets the data source of the template container. - 当关联的控件发生更改时, 将调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 当关联的控件数据源已更改时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the associated control data source has changed. 当关联控件数据源的架构发生更改时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes. 应用自动格式设置方案后, 将调用方法。The method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied. - 可以重写和方法,以实现当关联控件样式已更改或设计器模板编辑谓词分别更改时应发生的功能。The and methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively. 方法处理属性生成器事件。The method handles the property-builder event.

span.span: ASP.NET Control Designers Overview

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在创建类的新实例时, 它会在设计图面上创建派生自类的关联控件或该控件的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

value.span: 一个 ，是关联控件的数据源 ID。

span.span: A that is the data source ID of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置设计器的属性会导致设置关联控件的属性。Setting the designer's property causes the property of the associated control to be set. 如果将设置为, 表示将定义新数据源, 则会显示 "**创建数据源**" 对话框。 If the is set to a , indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed. 如果将设置为, 指示没有数据源, 则将设置为空字符串 ("")。 If the is set to a indicating there is no data source, the is set to an empty string ("").

span.span: The representing the default view of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通过将属性 传递给对象的方法, 获取绑定到关联控件的数据源的默认视图。 The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the property to the method of the object. 如果未返回任何视图或属性未设置 , 则使用的方法来获取视图名称, 并使用第一个视图名称获取默认视图。If no view is returned or the property is not set, the method of the is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.

span.span: A control derived from the , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器宿主准备好使用设计器呈现从类派生的控件时, 将调用方法。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并连接到设计器操作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. 连接到设计时数据源并更新设计时标记。The connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup. 如果该属性实现接口, 将连接、 和事件。 If the property implements the interface, the connects the , , and events. 参数是从派生的、与此设计器关联的控件或该控件`component`的副本。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 当关联的控件更改时调用。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当执行从 类派生的控件的事件时,将调用方法。The method is called when the event of a control that is derived from the class executes. 通常, 这是为了响应控件上的属性更改 (例如, "**属性**" 网格更改)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果更改了控件所绑定到的对象,则会在设计图面上重新绘制控件。If the object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基方法将派生自类的关联控件连接到当前数据源, 如果与控件连接到的数据源不同, 则方法更新设计时标记。 The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于模板编辑模式或正在添加或编辑字段, 否则方法会调用方法, 该方法又调用方法来更新控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void OnStylesChanged() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 可以重写以实现特定的功能，当关联控件的样式发生更改时必须出现此功能。

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可作为通知, 该类派生自类的关联控件的样式已发生更改。 The method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the class has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 可以重写以实现特定的功能，当设计器的模板编辑谓词发生更改时必须出现此功能。

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于执行其他处理, 如在编辑模板编辑谓词时记录发生了更改。The method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.

para.span: 方法是抽象的, 并且当派生类从类继承时, 必须重写此方法。

span.span: The method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现已添加和隐藏属性的 接口的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing an interface of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法, 用设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性, 并向**属性中添加属性或从中移除属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 对于从类派生的控件, 将创建用于隐藏、 、 和属性的设计时属性。For controls that are derived from the class, the creates design-time properties to shadow the , , , and properties.

para.span: 重写方法, 以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
